articles.title: Ukraine live updates: Explosions in Kyiv as strikes hit across Ukraine; Putin convenes his Security Council - The Washington Post
articles.description: Strikes hit Kyiv, Zaporizhzhia, Kharkiv and other cities. Russian President Vladimir Putin is calling his Security Council after the Crimean bridge explosion.
articles.content:
Ukraines national police reported five deaths and 12 injuries in the massive shelling of Kyiv Monday morning, saying most of the cases were in the center of the capital.

articles.title: Dem city council member says Blue Angels should be banned from flying over San Francisco - Fox News
articles.description: A San Francisco Democrat city council member said Sunday that the U.S. Navy Blue Angels should not be allowed in the city's airspace. The squadron's performance was canceled due to fog.
articles.content: The Blue Angels' scheduled show in San Francisco, California, for Fleet Week was canceled Sunday due to weather conditions, and a Democrat city council member suggested the planes not be permitted in… [+1570 chars]
